    public class MA_SendOrderEventHandler
extends it.softsolutions.bestx.handlers.BaseOperationEventHandler
    Purpose: order sending event handler. Manages all the possible cases resulting from an order sent to the market. Project Name : bestx-tradeweb-market First created by: ruggero.rizzo Creation date: 27/gen/2015
